5-7 Example with expanding

Column that's 7 spaces and a column that's 5 spaces, with 5 expanding 2 spaces.

I am 5 spaces, I also have .position--1 to make me be a higher index.
.position--#: Where "#" can be 1-12 for its z-index to be the # in the modifer. By default makes the element .position: relative, but you can also use .position-absolute--1 to make element have a position of absolute.

I am 7 spaces and offset by 2 spaces to the left.

5-7 Example with child layering

Column that's 7 spaces and a column that's 5 spaces, with child container expanding 2 spaces from 5 space column. 7 space has image using helper classes and is offset negatively by 1.

I am 5 spaces and contain more content than expected

More laying here too! I'm actually in the 7-Space column but I look like I'm in the 5-Space column
